channel.title: How do i add pickpocketing to npc
channel.description: when i try to steal from them nothing happens im using addictivepkz 317 source which is an insida source built up a little bit and i rwlly need help on how to add this so people can get to 30 thieving so they can then start on the stalls

item.title: How do i add pickpocketing to npc
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Second click NPC is handled in ActionHandler, public void secondClickNpc add pickpocketing there.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add pickpocketing to npc
